info.name: fo_77_verify_to_create_manual_transaction_linked_bill
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to create manual transaction

###### Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
    
2. Get data
    
    1. Account coa / Get list coa => get list debit account
        
    2. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => get list credit
        
    3. bill / Get list bill => get un_paid bill (get paid, partial_paid if needed) => pick 1 bill to create tnx
        
    4. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
        
    5. payment / get list payment => get total
        
    6. Report / Get report AR unpaid => get data
        
    7. Report / Get report AR customer => get data
        
    8. Report / Get report cash_flow => get data
        
    9. Report / account lifetime => get data
        
    10. Report / cash flow period => get data
        
    11. Report/ profit loss period => get data
        
    12. Report / chart balance change => get data
        
    13. Transaction / Get transaction summary => get data
        
    14. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
        
3. Create transaction (partial_paid for an unpaid)
    
    1. Unhappy case: null data (except txn_type > default 'out', value_at)
        
    2. Unhappy case: amount < 0
        
    3. Unhappy case: missing credit ()
        
    4. Unhappy case: object_type is null
        
    5. Unhappy case: credit is not existed
        
    6. Unhappy case: object_key is null
        
    7. Unhappy case: value_at is later bill_created
        
    8. Happy case => check all data created
        
4. Check data
    
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => have new record
        
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
        
    3. Transaction / Get transaction summary => check data
        
    4. payment / get list payment => update total (increase 1)
        
    5. payment / view payment detail => data correctly
        
    6. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
        
    7. bill / Get list bill => check bill status at 2.c
        
    8. bill / Get bill detail => update data
        
    9. Posting / get list posting => have 2 new posting (account receivable & account debit)
        
    10. Report / Get report AR unpaid => get data
        
    11. Report / Get report AR customer => get data
        
    12. Report / Get report cash_flow => get data
        
    13. Report / account lifetime => get data
        
    14. Report / cash flow period => get data
        
    15. Report/ profit loss period => get data
        
    16. Report / chart balance change => get data
        
5. Create transaction
    
    1. Happy case => fully paid for a partial_paid (/un_paid)
        
6. Check data
    
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => have new record
        
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
        
    3. Transaction / Get transaction summary => check data
        
    4. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
        
    5. bill / Get list bill => check bill status at 2.c
        
    6. bill / Get bill detail => update data
        
    7. Posting / get list posting => have 2 new posting (account receivable & account debit)
        
    8. Report / Get report AR unpaid => get data
        
    9. Report / Get report AR customer => get data
        
    10. Report / Get report cash_flow => get data
        
    11. Report / account lifetime => get data
        
    12. Report / cash flow period => get data
        
    13. Report/ profit loss period => get data
        
    14. Report / chart balance change => get data
        

###### Note:

- Account sẽ không có số liệu về amount, phần check balance_amount cần thực hiện ở các API về report
    
- debit account: payment for bill
    
- Tạm thời run case 1-2-3-4 hoặc 1-2-5-6, không run full vì phần data cần xử lý lại sau khi đã thực hiện tnx ở case 3
